400.description: Bad request if the provided data is incorrect

404.description: Not Found if the user does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error for any server errors

401.description: Unauthorized if the token is invalid

day.description:
Day of a month. Must be from 1 to 31 and valid for the year and month, or 0
to specify a year by itself or a year and month where the day isn't
significant.

month.description:
Month of a year. Must be from 1 to 12, or 0 to specify a year without a
month and day.

year.description:
Year of the date. Must be from 1 to 9999, or 0 to specify a date without
a year.

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

url.description: URL to download the file from Google Cloud Storage

participations.description: Many-to-many relationship with User through Participation

isOrganizer.description: Indicates if the user is an organizer of the hackathon

participations.description: Many-to-many relationship with Hackathon through Participation
